review: This is our 2nd Fire Stick. Truly amazing! So easy to use, with great picture quality. So many nice features, like controlling from your smart phone as well as its own remote, and slide shows of your cloud photo content. Very satisfied.
author: JG

review: Why didn't I know about this sooner!? I just canceled cable, don't have a smart TV, and needed something to stream my Netflix & Hulu accounts. After researching Chromecast, Apple TV & the Amazon Fire stick, I knew I was picking the best choice. Being an Amazon Prime member sealed the deal with all of the extra Amazon Instant TV movies/shows to choose from. It's simple to connect, it's user friendly, and a steal at $39 compared to the Roku & other streaming devices. I highly recommend it!
author: Amazon Customer
